p.d:
Hello all!
I have spent most of my life in the south of Stockholm, Sweden. During this time I have, among other thing‚s, studied at an art school and worked as an laboratory assistant for petrol products. But I have also been in other places such as the woods of Norrland , Costa Rica and off course Hyper Island in Karlskrona.
Me in three words: Optimistic, energetic and persistent(not always in a good way). Likes: Honest people, candy, shapes, colours, TV, structure and a lot of other things. Dislikes: Negativity, Gröna linjen(always something wrong) and likes/dislikes lists.
In the future I would like to work with creative projects and people!
